item.title: Amalthea add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "We're free Narnians, Hwin and I, and I suppose, if you're running away to Narnia you want to be one too. In that case Hwin isn't your horse any longer. One might just as well say you're her human." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Amalthea add a quote by Peter S. Beagle
item.description: "We are not always what we seem, and hardly ever what we dream." -- Peter S. Beagle

item.title: Amalthea add a quote by Christopher Paolini
item.description: "I cannot pretend that I regard this with favor, but the purpose of life is not what we want but what needs to be done." -- Christopher Paolini

item.title: Amalthea add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "You've taught me that we're all needed, even those who sometimes think we're worthless, plain and dull. If we love and allow ourselves to be loved...well, a person who loves is the most precious thing in the world, worth all the fortunes that ever were. That's what you've taught me, fur face,and because of you I'll never be the same." -- Dean Koontz
